nodes.text: The Vershyi Corporation was a weapons manufacturer known for its long-range weapons development teams. They had brought many weapons on the military market, but the Vershyi Sharpshooter was considered their best weapon.
This company is only mentioned in the description text of the Vershyi Sharpshooter, that players of Star Wars Galaxies can loot from some non-player characters on the planet Kashyyyk.
